Verses: 1 avar Thammudaiya Vaarththaigalaiyellaam Janangaludaiya Kaadhugal Ketkumpadi Solli Mudiththapinbu, Kapparnagoomukkup Ponaar.
2 ange Nootrukku Adhibadhiyaagiya Oruvanukkup Piriyamaana Velaikkaaran Viyaadhippattu Marana Avasdhaiyaayirundhaan.
3 avan Yesuvaikkuriththuk Kelvippattapodhu, Avar Vandhu Than Velaikkaaranaik Gunamaakkavendumendru, Avarai Vendikkollumpadi Yoodharudaiya Moopparai Avaridaththil Anuppinaan.
4 avargal Yesuvinidaththil Vandhu, Avaraik Karuththaai Vendikkondu: Neer Indhath Dhayavuseykiradharku Avan Paaththiranaayirukkiraan.
5 avan Nammudaiya Janaththai Nesikkiraan, Namakku Oru Jebaaalayaththaiyum Kattinaan Endraargal.

6 appozhudhu Yesu Avargaludane Koodapponaar. Veettukkuch Sameebamaanapodhu Nootrukku Adhibadhi Than Sinegidharai Nokki: Neengal Avaridaththil Poi, Aandavare! Neer Varuththappadavendaam; Neer En Veettu Vaasalukkul Piravesikka Naan Paaththiran Alla;
7 naan Ummidaththil Varavum Ennaippaaththiranaaga Ennavillai; Oru Vaarththaimaaththiram Sollum, Appozhudhu En Velaikkaaran Sosthamaavaan.

8 naan Adhigaaraththukkuk Keezhppattavanaayirundhum, Enakkuk Keezhppattirukkira Sevagarumundu; Naan Oruvanaip Povendraal Pogiraan, Matroruvanai Vaavendraal Varugiraan; En Velaikkaaranai, Idhaich Seyyendraal Seygiraan Endru Naan Sonnadhaakach Sollungal Endru Avargalai Anuppinaan.

9 yesu Ivaigalaik Kettu Avanaikkuriththu Aachchariyappattu, Thirumbi, Thamakkup Pinsellugira Thiralaana Janangalai Nokki: Isravelarukkullum Naan Ippadippatta Visuvaasaththaik Kaanavillai Endru Ungalukkuch Sollukiren Endraar.
10 anuppappattavargal Veettukkuth Thirumpivandhapodhu, Viyaadhiyaaik Kidandha Velaikkaaran Sugamadaindhirukkiradhaik Kandaargal.
11 marunaalile Avar Naayeen Ennum Oorukkup Ponaar; Avarudaiya Seeshar Anegarum Thiralaana Janangalum Avarudanekoodap Ponaargal.

12 avar Oorin Vaasalukkuch Sameepiththapodhu, Mariththuppona Oruvanai Adakkampannumpadi Konduvandhaargal; Avan Than Thaaikku Ore Maganaayirundhaan. Avalo Kaimpennaayirundhaal; Ooraaril Vegu Janangal Avaludanekooda Vandhaargal.
13 karththar Avalaip Paarththu, Avalmel Manadhurugi: Azhaadhe Endru Solli,
14 kittavandhu, Paadaiyaith Thottaar; Adhaich Sumandhavargal Nindraargal; Appozhudhu Avar: Vaalibane, Ezhundhiru Endru Unakkuch Sollugiren Endraar.
15 mariththavan Ezhundhu Utkaarndhu, Pesaththodanginaan. Avanai Avan Thaayinidaththil Oppuviththaar.
16 ellaarum Bayamadaindhu: Magaa Theerkkadharisiyaanavar Namakkulle Thondriyirukkiraar Endrum, Dhevan Thamadhu Janangalaich Sandhiththaar Endrum Solli, Dhevanai Magimaippaduththinaargal.
17 indhach Seydhi Yoodheyaa Dhesamuzhuvadhilum Sutriyirukkira Thisaigal Yaavatrilum Pirasiththamaayitru.
18 ivaigalaiyellaam Yovaanudaiya Seeshargal Avanukku Ariviththaargal. Appozhudhu Yovaan Thanseesharil Iranduperai Azhaiththu,
19 neengal Yesuvinidaththirkup Poi: Varugiravar Neerdhaanaa? Alladhu Veroruvar Varak Kaaththirukkavendumaa? Endru Kelungal Endru Solli Anuppinaan.
20 andhappadi Avargal Avaridaththil Vandhu: Varugiravar Neerdhaanaa? Alladhu Veroruvar Varak Kaaththirukkavendumaa? Endru Ketkumpadi Yovaansnaanan Engalai Ummidaththirku Anuppinaar Endraargal.
21 andhach Samayaththile Noigalaiyum Kodiya Viyaadhigalaiyum Pollaadha Aavigalaiyum Kondirundha Anegarai Avar Gunamaakki, Anegang Kurudarukkup Paarvaiyaliththaar.

22 yesu Avargalukkup Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Neengal Poi, Kandavaigalaiyum Kettavaigalaiyum Yovaanukku Ariviyungal; Kurudar Paarvaiyadaigiraargal, Sappaanigal Nadakkiraargal. Kushtarogigal Suththamaagiraargal, Sevidar Ketkiraargal, Mariththor Ezhundhirukkiraargal, Thariththirarukkuch Suvisesham Pirasangikkappadukiradhu.
23 ennidaththil Idaraladaiyaadhirukkiravan Evano Avan Baakkiyavaan Endraar.
24 yovaanudaiya Dhoodhargal Ponapinbu Avar Yovaanaikkuriththu Janangalukkuch Sonnadhu Ennavendraal: Edhaippaarkka Vanaandharaththirkup Poneergal? Kaatrinaal Asaiyum Naanalaiyo?
25 allavendraal, Edhaippaarkkapponeergal? Melliya Vasthirandhariththa Manushanaiyo? Alangaara Vasthirandhariththuch Selvamaai Vaazhkiravargal Arasar Maaligaigalile Irukkiraargal.
26 allavendraal, Edhaippaarkkapponeergal? Theerkkadharisiyaiyo? Aam, Theerkkadharisiyaip Paarkkilum Menmaiyullavanaiye Endru Ungalukkuch Sollugiren.
27 idho, Naan En Dhoodhanai Umakku Munbaaga Anuppugiren; Avan Umakku Munne Poi, Umadhu Vazhiyai Aayaththam Pannuvaan Endru Ezhudhiya Vaakkiyaththaal Kurikkappattavan Ivandhaan.

28 sthireegalidaththile Pirandhavargalil Yovaansnaananaip Paarkkilum Periyadheerkkadharisi Oruvanumillai; Aagilum, Dhevanudaiya Raajyaththil Siriyavanaayirukkiravan Avanilum Periyavanaayirukkiraanendru Ungalukkuch Sollugiren Endraar.
29 yovaanudaiya Ubadhesaththaik Ketta Aayakkaarar Mudhalaana Sagala Janangalum Avanaale Gnaanasnaanam Petru, Dhevan Needhiparar Endru Arikkaiyittaargal.
30 pariseyarum Niyaayasaasdhirigalumo Avanaale Gnaanasnaanam Peraamal Thangalukkuk Kedundaaga Dhevanudaiya Aalosanaiyaith Thallivittaargal.
31 pinnum Karththar Sonnadhu: Indhach Sandhadhiyai Yaarukku Oppiduven? Ivargal Yaarukku, Oppaayirukkiraargal?

32 sandhai Veliyil Utkaarndhu, Oruvaraiyoruvar Paarththu: Ungalukkaagak Kuzhal Oodhinom, Neengal Kooththaadavillai; Ungalukkaagap Pulambinom, Neengal Azhavillai Endru Kurai Sollugira Pillaigalukku Oppaayirukkiraargal.
33 eppadiyenil, Yovaansnaanan Appam Pusiyaadhavanum Thiraatcharasam Kudiyaadhavanumaai Vandhaan; Adharku Neengal: Avan Pisaasu Pidiththirukkiravan Engireergal.
34 manushakumaaran Pojanabaanampannukiravaraai Vandhaar; Adharku Neengal: Idho, Pojanappiriyanum Madhubaanappiriyanumaana Manushan, Aayakkaararukkum Paavigalukkum Sinegidhan Engireergal
35 aanaalum Gnaanamaanadhu Adhan Pillaigalellaaraalum Needhiyulladhendru Oppukkollappadum Endraar.
36 pariseyaril Oruvan Thannudane Pojanampanna Vendumendru Avarai Vendikkondaan; Avar Andhap Pariseyanudaiya Veettil Piravesiththup Pandhiyirundhaar.
37 appozhudhu Andha Oorilirundha Paaviyaagiya Oru Sthiree Avar Pariseyan Veettile Pandhiyirukkiradhai Arindhu, Oru Paraniyil Parimalathailam Konduvandhu,

38 avarudaiya Paadhangalin Aruge Pinnaaga Nindru Azhudhukondu, Avarudaiya Paadhangalaith Than Kanneerinaal Nanaiththu, Than Thalaimayirinaal Thudaiththu, Avarudaiya Paadhangalai Muththanjeydhu, Parimaladhailaththaip Poosinaal.

39 avarai Azhaiththa Pariseyan Adhaik Kandapodhu, Ivar Theerkkadharisiyaayirundhaal Thammaith Thodugira Sthiree Innaalendrum Ippadippattavalendrum Arindhiruppaar; Ival Paaviyaayirukkiraale Endru Thanakkulle Sollikkondaan.
40 yesu Avanai Nokki: Seemone, Unakku Naan Oru Kaariyam Sollavendum Endraar. Adharku Avan: Podhagare, Sollum Endraan.
41 appozhudhu Avar: Oruvanidaththil Iranduper Kadanpattirundhaargal; Oruvan Ainnooru Vellikkaasum, Matravan Aimbadhu Vellikkaasum Kodukkavendiyadhaayirundhadhu.
42 kodukka Avargalukku Nirvaagamillaadhapodhu, Iruvarukkum Kadanai Manniththuvittaan. Ippadiyirukka, Avargalil Evan Avanidaththil Adhiga Anbaayiruppaan? Adhaich Sol Endraar.
43 seemon Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Evanukku Adhigamaai Manniththuvittaano Avane Adhiga Anbaayiruppaan Endru Ninaikkiren Endraan; Adharku Avar: Sariyaai Nidhaaniththaai Endru Solli,

44 sthireeyinidamaaith Thirumbi, Seemonai Nokki: Indha Sthireeyaippaarkkiraaye; Naan Un Veettil Piravesiththen, Nee En Kaalkalukkuth Thanneer Tharavillai, Ivalo, Kanneerinaal En Kaalgalai Nanaiththu, Than Thalaimayirinaal Avaigalaith Thudaiththaal.
45 nee Ennai Muththanjeyyavillai, Ivalo Naan Utpiravesiththadhu Mudhal, En Paadhangalai Oyaamal Muththanjeydhaal.
46 nee En Thalaiyil Enney Poosavillai, Ivalo En Paadhangalil Parimalathailam Poosinaal.
47 aadhalaal Naan Unakkuch Sollugiren: Ival Seydha Anega Paavangal Mannikkappattadhu; Ival Migavum Anbukoorndhaale. Evanukkuk Konjam Mannikkappadugiradho, Avan Konjamaai Anbu Kooruvaan Endru Solli;
48 avalai Nokki: Un Paavangal Mannikkappattadhu Endraar.
49 appozhudhu Koodap Pandhiyirundhavargal: Paavangalai Mannikkira Ivan Yaarendru Thangalukkulle Sollikkondaargal.
50 avar Sthireeyai Nokki: Un Visuvaasam Unnai Ratchiththadhu, Samaadhaanaththode Po Endraar.
